targets.expr: 100 * max by (pod)(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="bitswap-peer", container!="", image!=""}) / on (pod) max by (pod)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="bitswap-peer", resource="memory"})

alert.message: Open FDs above 1600 for at least 20 minutes.
alert.name: Open FDs alert

alert.message: There are messages on indexer DLQ
alert.name: Messages on Indexer DLQ alert

alert.message: There are more than 100 messages on Indexer DLQ
alert.name: Messages on Indexer DLQ - P1 Alert alert

panels.title: Messages on Indexer DLQ - P1 Alert

alert.message: There are errors on Indexer Lambda.
alert.name: Indexer errors alert

panels.title: Indexer Errors, Invocations and Success Rate

alert.message: There are errors on bucket-to-indexer Lambda
alert.name: bucket-to-indexer errors alert

alert.message: There are errors on side-indexer Lambda
alert.name: side-indexer errors alert

targets.expression:
filter @message like "Announcing to the indexer node failed"
| stats count(*) as `Announcing to the indexer node failed` by bin(1m)

alert.message: Goroutines has increased above 2000 for at least 20 minutes.
alert.name: Goroutines alert

alert.message: There are pods consuming more than 80% Memory
alert.name: Memory Usage %  by pod alert

targets.expr: 100 * max by (pod)(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="bitswap-peer", container!="", image!=""}) / on (pod) max by (pod)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{namespace="bitswap-peer", resource="memory"})

alert.message: There are pods using high CPU on bitswap
alert.name: CPU Usage by pod alert
